title: (x) Sea Cat logo - Flamenco Solid {Mike Y}
content:
Can you please identity the font used to produce the Sea Cat logo found on [http://www.seacatboats.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125708/http:/www.seacatboats.com/)   
and on the attachment?   
   
Thanks in advance!!!   
   
rbkat ![Sea Cat logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125708im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47797.jpg)
author: rbkat

comments.content: I think it looks like Flamenco Inline, without the inline.
And by golly there is a [Flamenco solid](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125708/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/flamenco/d/testdrive.html?s=Sea%20Cat&p=48) from URW.
